introduction: A long time ago in a galaxy far, far away...

episodes.title: The Foyer
episodes.room_description: You find yourself in an ugly room with purple wallpaper.
episodes.episode_narrative: The day started well, but things got weird fast. You were walking, as you do every morning, but a thick fog gradually rose up from the dewy grass. Out of the fog a strange house appeared on your right. You walk up to the door and find it partly ajar.
episodes.traps: The treasure chest lid was rusty and sharp. You cut your hand and contract tetanus.

creatures.name: Bob
creatures.introduction: A big, hairy, blue beast lumbers before you.
creatures.story: I was born without vowels. Can you help me find some vowels?
